fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Downgrade a non-Creator role at night.
- Upgrade a Creator role at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Downgrades are permanent, upgrades are not.
- Downgrades do not notify the victim.
- Downgrading has the following effects depending on the alignment.
* Killing: Down an attack tier and removes a charge of all abilities, if applicable. If the attack becomes a None attack, they will become unable to kill.
* Protective: Roles that can kill lose their attack value. Otherwise, protections are only against direct attacks, only against one attack, and only against Basic attacks.
* Investigative: Every other night, they will receive a randomized result.
* Support/Head/Power and Others: You may choose to silently redirect all downgraded players of this alignment to themselves if their ability is negative. If not, their ability will secretly fail instead. This is in place of your night ability if you can only use one.
- Upgrades have the following effects depending on the role that take place the next day.
* The Founder: Rampage attack and all Creators are affected by the day ability.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value:
* The Designer: Learn the roles of all of your target's and your visitors, as well as their names.
* The Simulator: Select 5 players instead of 3.
